org.fujion.chartjs.common

Class LegendOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.chartjs.common.LegendOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class LegendOptions
extends Options
    Options for controlling legend display.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean display
      If true, the legend is shown.
      Boolean fullWidth
      Marks that this box should take the full width of the canvas (pushing down other boxes).
      LegendLabelOptions labels
      Legend label options.
      String onClick
      A callback that is called when a click event is registered on a label item.
      String onHover
      A callback that is called when a 'mousemove' event is registered on top of a label item.
      PositionEnum position
      Position of the legend.
      Boolean reverse
      Legend will show datasets in reverse order.

      Constructor and Description
      LegendOptions()

    • Field Detail

      • display

        @Option
public Boolean display
        If true, the legend is shown.

        Default: true;

      • fullWidth

        @Option
public Boolean fullWidth
        Marks that this box should take the full width of the canvas (pushing down other boxes).

        Default: true

      • labels

        @Option
public final LegendLabelOptions labels
        Legend label options.

      • onClick

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String onClick
        A callback that is called when a click event is registered on a label item.

      • onHover

        @Option(convertTo=JavaScript.class)
public String onHover
        A callback that is called when a 'mousemove' event is registered on top of a label item.

      • position

        @Option
public PositionEnum position
        Position of the legend.

      • reverse

        @Option
public Boolean reverse
        Legend will show datasets in reverse order.

        Default: false
